q: | Steve Ballmer Calls Apple's Hand, Introduces "Slate PCs" At CES Saying it's almost as portable as a phone and as powerful as a PC and that it's ideal for reading, surfing the web and taking entertainment on the go, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer revealed what he called "slate PCs" at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas yesterday.
